p.s: In the text Hope of escape lost in translation from Zia Haider Rahman, published on the 17th December 2016 on The Sunday Times.
The author said, that it costs a lot of money on translating and interpreting.
He said that the immigrant communities did not have to learn English.
He said also that you learn really quick English, when you are in London in the Bangladesh community.
The teachers in his school said nothing about his different skin colour.
The Awareness-raising programs did not help him.
